Package org.fluidity.composition.spi

Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentFactory
    Creates instances of a component when mere constructor and field injection is not adequate.
    ComponentFactory.Bindings
    Bindings for a component created by a ComponentFactory.
    ComponentFactory.Container
    A ComponentFactory.Resolver that can create local resolvers.
    ComponentFactory.Instance
    Represents a future component instance created by a ComponentFactory.
    ComponentFactory.Registry
    Registry to bind components to by a ComponentFactory.
    ComponentFactory.Resolver
    Container to resolve dependencies of some component to be created by the component factory.
    ComponentInterceptor<T>
    Replaces a component before it is injected as a dependency.
    ContainerTermination
    Enables jobs to be executed when the application shuts down.
    ContainerTermination.Jobs<T>
    Maintains the list of jobs on behalf of a ContainerTermination component.
    Dependency<T>
    A dependency that can be replaced by a ComponentInterceptor, and can be injected to a component when created by a ComponentFactory.
    PackageBindings
    An implementation of this interface is placed, either automatically by the org.fluidity.maven:composition-maven-plugin Maven plugin or manually by the component developer, in each package that contains component implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmptyPackageBindings
    Empty package bindings to simplify creation of actual implementations.

Package org.fluidity.composition.spi Description

Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.

This package offers means to integrate into Fluid Tools composition:

  • custom component instantiation
  • custom component life cycle management
  • custom application life cycle management
  • component interceptors
